data.value: If an integer, it becomes the order of the polynomial to fit. If a sequence of numbers, then these are the explicit powers in the polynomial. A constant term (power 0) is always included, so don't include 0. Thus, polynomial(n) is equivalent to polynomial(range(1, n+1)).
Factory function for a general polynomial model.
